text: phu dı ptiseth sraththa tx xallxhˌ hlangcak thi khea di sraththa læw (khea ca di rab khwam kriw ca kxallxhˌ) wentæ phu thi thuk bangkhab thang «thi hawcı khxng khea peiym pi dwy sraththa tæ phu dı peid hawxk khxng khea dwy kar ptiseth sraththa phwk khea k ca di rab khwam kriw ca kxallxhˌ læa sahrab phwk khea ca di rab kar lngthosʹ xyang mhant
